snippet: The former director, Jeffrey Bernstein,was arraigned on charges of grand larceny and money laundering, stemming from his time at the Albert Ellis Institute.
abstract: Jeffrey Bernstein, former director of the Albert Ellis Institute in Manhattan, a nonprofit psychotherapy organization, is charged with grand larceny and money laundering; prosecutors say he stole more than $2.5 million from the group during his tenure.
lead_paragraph: The former director, Jeffrey Bernstein,was arraigned on charges of grand larceny and money laundering, stemming from his time at the Albert Ellis Institute.

headline.seo: Ex-Director of Psychotherapy Group Accused of Theft
headline.main: Ex-Director of Psychotherapy Group Is Accused of Stealing $2.5 Million
